Text: Re CongratulationsHi Rod I will be accepting the offer that Enron has extended and would be delighted to meet with you during my summer internship Again thank you for taking the time to have interviewed me look forward to seeing you again Sincerely Denka Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom wrote I am hoping each of you is seriously considering our offer to join Enron for an experience you surely wont forget I would like to extend to each of you an invitation to lunch during your employment to further discuss opportunities at Enron and to see how you are doing Do You Yahoo Get email at your own domain with Yahoo Mail
